article_title: Prosecutors Bring New Allegations Against Ex Massey Energy CEO
article_text:
Federal prosecutors have leveled a new allegation at a former West Virginia coal executive in a case connected to a 2010 coal mine explosion, accusing him of conspiring to falsify dust samples.

Former Massey Energy Co. CEO Don Blankenship pleaded not guilty in November to a four-count indictment that included charges he lied to investors about the company’s safety record and conspired to conceal hazards from federal inspectors in the...
